fields.description: HTML color code representing the color of the border line, of the form #RRGGBB (for example 'FFA500') or as a named HTML color (for example 'orange').
fields.name: Color

fields.description: Constant value that indicates the specific side of the border. Possible values are: EdgeTop, EdgeBottom, EdgeLeft, EdgeRight, InsideVertical, InsideHorizontal, DiagonalDown, DiagonalUp. Read-only.
fields.name: SideIndex

fields.description: One of the constants of line style specifying the line style for the border. Possible values are: None, Continuous, Dash, DashDot, DashDotDot, Dot, Double, SlantDashDot.
fields.name: Style

fields.description: Specifies the weight of the border around a range. Possible values are: Hairline, Thin, Medium, Thick.
fields.name: Weight
